name: LanguageAccessScreeningAssessmentsQuestions
title: Language Access Screening Assessments Questions
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents screening assessment questions for Language Access as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessment questions in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses for this SDOH domain (e.g., for the SDOHCC Observation Screening Response profile in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for SDOH screening assessment questions as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes the questions not selected by the Gravity Project from SDOH screening assessments.)

concept.display: How well do you read english [NLAAS]
What language do you feel most comfortable speaking with your doctor or nurse [SAMHSA]
